session_summary: FastAPI deployment readiness preparation completed. Created deployment documentation, process management configurations, monitoring setup, deployment scripts, and endpoint specifications documentation.

completed_tasks.description: Created comprehensive FastAPI deployment readiness package. Reviewed FastAPI implementation, extracted endpoint specifications, created deployment plan with environment setup, process management (systemd and Supervisor), automated deployment script with rollback, monitoring configuration with health checks and resource monitoring, and endpoint specifications documentation. Deployment readiness complete, awaiting Agent-1 detailed endpoint specs for route groups.

scope_completed: FastAPI deployment plan created with environment setup, process management, monitoring
Process management configurations created (systemd and Supervisor)
Automated deployment script created with backup, validation, health checks, rollback
Monitoring configuration and scripts created (health checks, resource monitoring)
Endpoint specifications documented from implementation review
All deployment artifacts committed to git
decisions_made: Use systemd for Linux production deployments (standard system service)
Use Supervisor as cross-platform alternative (works on Windows/Linux/Mac)
Deploy health check monitoring as separate service (30-second intervals)
Integrate monitoring with existing alerting system (src.infrastructure.alerting_system)
Separate HTTP API (port 8000) and WebSocket (port 8765) processes
Deployment script includes rollback capability but requires manual intervention for zero-downtime (blue-green would require load balancer)
tradeoffs: Deployment script rollback capability present but zero-downtime deployments require blue-green setup with load balancer configuration
Monitoring scripts use bash for portability but require Python for alerting system integration
Process management offers both systemd and Supervisor (choice depends on deployment environment)

agent_1.task: FastAPI deployment readiness - Agent-3 prepared deployment artifacts, awaiting Agent-1 detailed endpoint specifications for /api/v1/trades, /api/v1/account, /api/v1/strategies routes

agent_4.task: FastAPI deployment readiness coordination - Agent-4 verified deployment artifacts, Agent-3 completed deployment readiness preparation

knowledge_transfers.fastapi_deployment_process: Deployment process: (1) Environment setup (Python 3.11+, venv, dependencies), (2) Process management configuration (systemd or Supervisor), (3) Environment variable configuration, (4) Deployment execution via deploy_fastapi.sh, (5) Health check verification, (6) Monitoring setup and alerting configuration. Ports: HTTP API (8000), WebSocket (8765).
knowledge_transfers.fastapi_monitoring_integration: Monitoring integration: Health check monitor runs continuously (30-second intervals), resource monitor checks CPU/memory/disk every 5 minutes. Both integrate with src.infrastructure.alerting_system for Discord alerts. Alert thresholds: Critical (3+ health failures), Warning (resource >85-90%).
knowledge_transfers.fastapi_process_management: Process management options: systemd (native Linux service management, auto-restart on failure), Supervisor (cross-platform, web UI for monitoring, process grouping). Choose based on deployment environment.
